text: DWDY (1107 kHz) is an AM radio station owned and operated by Northeastern Broadcasting Services. The station's studio and transmitter are located in Isabela Hotel, Brgy. Minante 1, Cauayan, Isabela.Federalism roadshow kicks off in IsabelaRice information in the airwavesSeason 3 of FICOBank Radio Program StartsG.R.
